thread.title: Annaliza Arceo
thread.title_full: Quality Logo Products, Inc. reviewed by Annaliza Arceo

author: Annaliza Arceo
title: Annaliza Arceo
text: We are very satisfied with our Very Kool Cooling Towels. I just hope our clients will love them as much as we do. The placement and the size of our logo is just right! The only thing we wish, is that the Very Kool Cooling Towels came in individual containers or bags, but other than that, we love our Very Kool Cooling Towels.
